availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Located in Frankfort, Kentucky. Kentucky legislature allocated funds for construction in 1850. Designed by Nathanial C. Cook. Served as the site for storing weapons and munitions during the Civil War.

ab.bibl:
William B. Scott, Jr., "Old State Arsenal" in The Kentucky Encyclopedia, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 695.
Tim Talbott, “State Arsenal,” ExploreKYHistory, accessed June 24, 2019, https://explorekyhistory.ky.gov/items/show/225.
